text.title: Edward Snowden in talks to return to United States
text.head: Edward Snowden in talks to return to United States
Sources

list.item: AP. "Edward Snowden would go back to U.S. if guaranteed fair trial: lawyer" — Canadian Broadcasting Corporation , March 3 2015
Grant Gross. "Snowden willing to face trial in US, if it's fair" — PC World , March 3 2015
Bill Hutchinson. "Edward Snowden in talks to return to United States from Russian exile: lawyer" — Daily News (New York) , March 3 2015
"Fugitive ex-NSA contractor Snowden seeks to come home: lawyer" — Reuters , March 3 2015
